special_text:
You may pay 4 life as you cast this spell. If you do, it can't be countered.
[+1]: Each player discards a card. If you discarded a black card, each opponent loses 2 life.
[-2]: Target player sacrifices a creature. 
[-8]: Each opponent loses 8 life. Return up to three noncreature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
